repetition.translate: повторение, повтор, репетиция, копия, заучивание наизусть, повторение наизусть
examples: Repetition can help the learning process.
Children used to learn by repetition.
One secret to a successful radio campaign is repetition.
His lectures tend to heaviness and repetition.
Sometimes repetition is necessary to drive a point home.
His theories have become for himself a little staled by dint of repetition.
